Class: GooRunner

goo\entities/GooRunner

Standard setup of entity system to use as base for small projects/demos

new GooRunner(Object parameters)

Method summary

_disableEvent (string type)

Disables event listening on the goorunner
_enableEvent (string type)

Enables event listening on the goorunner
addEventListener (string type, function(event) Callback)

Adds an event listener to the goorunner
pick (Number x, Number y, Function callback, Boolean skipUpdateBuffer)

Requests a pick from screenspace coordinates. A successful pick returns id and depth of the pick target.
removeEventListener (string type, function(event) Callback)

Removes an event listener to the goorunner
startGameLoop ()

Starts the game loop. (done through requestAnimationFrame)
stopGameLoop ()

Stops the game loop.
takeSnapshot ()

Takes an image snapshot from the 3d scene at next rendercall

Constructor

new GooRunner(Object parameters)

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
parameters Object <optional>

GooRunner settings passed in a JSON object.

Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
alpha boolean <optional>
 false
premultipliedAlpha boolean <optional>
 true
antialias boolean <optional>
 true
stencil boolean <optional>
 false
preserveDrawingBuffer boolean <optional>
 false
canvas canvas <optional>

If not supplied, Renderer will create a new canvas
showStats boolean <optional>
 false
manuallyStartGameLoop boolean <optional>
 false
logo boolean <optional>
 true
tpfSmoothingCount boolean <optional>
 10
debugKeys boolean <optional>
 false

Methods

_disableEvent(string type)

Disables event listening on the goorunner

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string

Can currently be 'click', 'mousedown', 'mousemove' or 'mouseup'

_enableEvent(string type)

Enables event listening on the goorunner

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string

Can currently be 'click', 'mousedown', 'mousemove' or 'mouseup'

addEventListener(string type, function(event) Callback)

Adds an event listener to the goorunner

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string

Can currently be 'click', 'mousedown', 'mousemove' or 'mouseup'
Callback function(event)

to call when event is fired

pick(Number x, Number y, Function callback, Boolean skipUpdateBuffer)

Requests a pick from screenspace coordinates. A successful pick returns id and depth of the pick target.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
x Number

screen coordinate
y Number

screen coordinate
callback Function

to handle the pick result
skipUpdateBuffer Boolean

when true picking will be attempted against existing buffer

removeEventListener(string type, function(event) Callback)

Removes an event listener to the goorunner

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string

Can currently be 'click', 'mousedown', 'mousemove' or 'mouseup'
Callback function(event)

to remove from event listener

startGameLoop()

Starts the game loop. (done through requestAnimationFrame)

stopGameLoop()

Stops the game loop.

takeSnapshot()

Takes an image snapshot from the 3d scene at next rendercall
